last_episode_to_air.name: Hell House
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sinbad's soul hangs in the balance as Scratch and a woman from his past battle to draw him to either the darkness or the light.

name: The Adventures of Sinbad
overview: The Adventures of Sinbad is a Canadian television series which aired from 1996 to 1998. It follows on the story from the pilot of the same name, and revolves around the series' protagonist, Sinbad. The series is a re-telling of the adventures of Sinbad from The Arabian Nights.

episodes.name: Return of Sinbad (1)
episodes.overview: Sinbad returns to Bagdad after two long years at sea. He discovers that things are not as he left them. The city is now in the hands of an incompetent Prince and his devious grand vizier.

episodes.name: Return of Sinbad (2)
episodes.overview: Sinbad sets out with a new crew to save a kidnapped princess from and evil sorcerer and his daughter. Along the way, Sinbad and his crew battle a raging sea monster and a traitor.

episodes.name: The Beast Within
episodes.overview: A sorceress captures Sinbad, who refuses her love, then he must fight to the death the man-beast Goz.

episodes.name: Still Life
episodes.overview: The crew runs aground on a mysterious island, where a sculptor, Vincenzo, wants to immortalize Maeve in marble.

episodes.name: The Ronin
episodes.overview: Sinbad is chosen to champion the island kingdom of Baronia. He must battle several adversaries, including a reluctant Samurai.

episodes.name: Little Miss Magic
episodes.overview: After the Nomad suffers damage in a storm the crew is forced to stop in the City of Mists. Sindbad wins the 'Jewel of the City' in a card game, only to discover that the 'Jewel' is Serendib, a 15 year old girl with magical powers.

episodes.name: King Firouz
episodes.overview: Firouz builds a new invention he calls the Ruby Beamer. When the crew goes ashore to apologize for damage it caused, Firouz is acclaimed as the people's savior.

episodes.name: The Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: While out for a walk, Maeve is kidnaapped by norseman who believe she has ben sent by the god Thor as a sacrifice to the Gulien Demon.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: The crew is after and Egyptian obelisk that gives power to whoever possesses it. Rumina disguises herself as Sinbad in order to start a war.

episodes.name: Conundrum
episodes.overview: Rongar is sold to the Dark Lord Scrath. They are given the opportunity to rescue him by completeing a task set for them. Sinbad and his crew race to find skulls that represent the four elements.

episodes.name: The Prince Who Wasn't
episodes.overview: A prince enlists Sinbad to help him rid haunted Arborea of an evil usurper.

episodes.name: The Village Vanishes
episodes.overview: The monster Vorgon drains the life force from a village, then picks a man for its host; now it wants Sinbad.

episodes.name: Masked Marauders
episodes.overview: Sinbad and his crew are challenged by Carpet-riding thieves in Mirhago.

episodes.name: The Ghoul's Tale
episodes.overview: When the necklace that protects Princess Gaia of Leopold is stolen by Vatex, the crew, with the help of Suraya, try to get it back.

episodes.name: The Rescue
episodes.overview: A rich merchant asks Sinbad to help rescue his missing wife.

episodes.name: The Eyes of Kratos
episodes.overview: Talia, pirate acquaintance from Sinbad's past, is attempting to rescue a sacred stone from of a cult that is worshipping it. Maeve is suspisious of Talia's motives.

episodes.name: The Bully
episodes.overview: The crew battle a cyclopse as well as a demon from Sinbad's past.

episodes.name: Monument
episodes.overview: A young woman asks Sinbad for help getting back to her home. When they get there, they discover that he father has turned himself into a giant.

episodes.name: Trickster
episodes.overview: Rumina follows the crew to the Old One's Island where they all become trapped. In order to escape, they must work together against the Trickster who is using their fears against them.

episodes.name: The Siren's Song
episodes.overview: Three cursed sailors come aboard the Nomad. Sinbad and his crew are held hostage by a madman seeking Poseidon's trident.

episodes.name: Isle of Bliss
episodes.overview: The of the Nomad journey to the Isle of Bliss in order to find the singing sword so that they can use it to get Master Dim Dim back. Things go horribly wrong when they encounter a giant snake and the crew must fight for the life of Doubar.

episodes.name: The Vengeance of Rumina
episodes.overview: Scratch and Rumina join forces to raise her father, Turock, from the dead. In return for his help, Rumina agrees to help Scratch steal the souls of Sinbad and the Nomad's crew.

episodes.name: The Sacrifice
episodes.overview: Maeve is lost in a sea storm and Sinbad becomes separated from the crew as he searches for her. On a small island Sinbad meets Bryn, a woman with no memory of her past and a rainbow bracelet, like his, and no memory.

episodes.name: The Return of the Ronin
episodes.overview: Sinbad and Tetsu the Ronin join forces to defeat seven mystical demons that are kidnapping women from an isolated village.

episodes.name: Heart and Soul
episodes.overview: Sinbad and his crew are imprisoned by the beautiful vampire, Kalilah. She will spare the crew if Sinbad can retrieve her heart which was taken from her by the black magic of her vampire husband, Baron Orlock. Sinbad and Rongar seek the heart with Orlock's deadly assistant, Marissa, in pursuit.

episodes.name: The Voyage to Hell
episodes.overview: As the son of an evil warlord and a witch, Young Timur has more problems than your average young man. His dead father's demonic spirit is looking for a new home and his son's body seems more than adequate. Sinbad and crew must journey to Hell to save Young Timur from his father and eternal damnation.

episodes.name: Ali Rashid and the Thieves
episodes.overview: Returning to his homeland, Rongar confronts the man who robbed him of his birthright and is reunited with his sister, the seer Zorah, who had betrayed him years before.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.overview: Sinbad and crew meet up with old friends and an old enemy at a wedding feast. The victum of a past injustice, Bakbuk the tinker sends his army of killer dolls to seek revenge.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Gorgons
episodes.overview: Sinbad and crew come to the aid of villagers whose firstborn sons are being enslaved by the three gorgon sisters: Eurayle, Stheno and Medusa, to work in their jasper mine.

episodes.name: The Beast of Basra
episodes.overview: A werewolf's bite passes the curse to Doubar and Sinbad must kill his brother to save Bryn from a gruesome death.

episodes.name: The Monster
episodes.overview: A gentle giant, Uruk, is helped by Sinbad and friends to break free from the evil wizard Kumar.

episodes.name: The Passengers
episodes.overview: Evil accompanies two passengers taking a woman's body to an island burial.

episodes.name: The Book of Before
episodes.overview: Marauding Druids are after an ancient, magical Wiccan book.

episodes.name: A City Under Plague
episodes.overview: Death riders imprison suspected plague victims, including Sinbad and crew.

episodes.name: The Empress
episodes.overview: A mystical empress believes Sinbad is her reincarnated lover.

episodes.name: Castle Keep
episodes.overview: A prince's gala features the public execution of pirates, among them, Sinbad.

episodes.name: The Gryphon's Tale
episodes.overview: To his grief, a game hunter captures a baby gryphon for his side show.

episodes.name: The Beast of the Dark
episodes.overview: A teen who controls an invisible beast holds Sinbad and the crew captive.

episodes.name: Survival Run
episodes.overview: Sinbad escorts a beautiful prisoner to trial for murder, but someone does not want her to get there.

episodes.name: The Minotaur
episodes.overview: Sinbad faces the Minotaur to restore an island to its rightful rule.

episodes.name: Stalkers
episodes.overview: Sinbad and crew come to the aid of a village being attacked by the mysterious stalkers that are controlled by the mad scientist Naaupo.

episodes.name: The Guardians
episodes.overview: Sinbad and crew are entrusted with the care of an infant with magical ties to an order of warrior monks.

episodes.name: Hell House
episodes.overview: Sinbad's soul hangs in the balance as Scratch and a woman from his past battle to draw him to either the darkness or the light.
